document.full_text: unidentified gunmen fired on worshippers at mosques in somalia's self-proclaimed state of puntland, killing at least six people and wounding dozens, residents and security officials said sunday.
document.title: gunmen kill six in attacks on two somali mosques
lines_and_colors: unidentified gunmen fired on worshippers at mosques in somalia's self-proclaimed state of puntland, killing at least six people and wounding dozens, residents and security officials said sunday.
